result.title: Production related tools
result.description: This report will refer to the automatic annotation tool as well as to its interfacing with the multimedia content storage, search and retrieval (MCSSR) system. Both the Automatic Annotation Tool and the MCSSR will be provided as standalone components, providing storage in a well-organized archiving system, search and retrieval functionalities, as well as automatic annotation and annotation pairing to the documentary related multimedia content. Information about their usage in the whole documentary creation process will be included in this deliverable. Input from T3.2.

result.title: Post-production related tools
result.description: This report will refer to the developed interactive-enriched video creation, 3600 video playout, second screen interaction and social recommendation and personalization tools. The four tools that will contribute to the post-production phase will be provided as standalone components, highlighting their functionalities. Information about their usage in the whole documentary creation process will be included in this deliverable. Input from T3.3.

result.title: Conference information package
result.description: This deliverable is an information package for the participants of the multi-actor deliberation event on encouraging societal engagement under the terms of RRI; it includes information on the conference format used, general information on the planned project, information on project insights in barriers/incentives and possible ways of dealing with these. The conference participants will receive this information in advance of the conference.

result.title: Data Management Plan (DMP)
result.description:
This deliverable defines the management life-cycle for all data that will be collected, processed or generated during the project. This deliverable contains: - What data the project will generate - Whether and how it will be made accessible and - How it will be maintained and preserved.
New versions of the DMP will be created whenever important changes to the project occur (due to inclusion of new data sets, changes in consortium policies or external factors). The data will be preserved in an open repository agreed by the partners, for example the DIGITAL.CSIC (https://digital.csic.es/?locale=en) or the institutional repository of the Politechnical University of Valencia (https://riunet.upv.es/).
